7月最後に、るしあちゃんと過ごせてとっても幸せでした:_猫耳るしあちゅう:

企画案たくさん出てて、楽しみがさらに増した！何をするかはお楽しみだね:_ハート:

author: Nexcell Pride
text:
That third part was awesome...
Only a Zatsudan about how compensate later... One of these ideas were Penalty activities or also Punishment game (Batsugeemu), "Nyanko ASMR", Collab Gakuka, Intellectual Tests, Reverse Price, Impersonation...

Personally talking, I was thinking in a "Game testing" and later she can make a poll voting for each game, where we participate.

But well... Anyway, in this stream, everyone, even Rushia, ended winning a lot
Like... Wait... These 0:39:35 with that voice... Or also... 0:40:46 with... Wait... A new demonstration about New Live2D Version 3.4 (Modeling by Tou Ilie, based on Yasuyuki-sensei's original concept) and how is defined that princess dress based obviously in that New Live2D shown at that 2020 June 16th...
And yes... Butterflies ornaments are now green instead of pink.
Rushia has 1,43 m., but these shoes make her a bit taller than these short boots from that first costume.
Also neck part of dress has a collar. Recently I noticed it.

In one part, Rushia becomes tsundere at 0:41:38 and 0:41:47 and 0:41:55 calling us "perverted"
Rushia was designed to being comically yandere, but also has her tsundere part.

:_ちょうちょ: Uruha Rushia's Original Character Design by Yasuyuki-sensei. 
(For more information, please contact him at Twitter: "yasu00kamiki" and "kamikirebasami") 
:_ハート: Live2D modeling by Tou Ilie. 


Personal Mark :_きゅん: 1:22:40
It seems Supaachaato Orei Time was cut at the end due to Rushia also wanted to tune Shion-chan's comeback.
